definitions.definition: Any of various poisonous plants , of the genus Aconitum , with blue or white flowers in the shape of a hood.
The dried leaves or flowers of these plants formerly used as a source of medicinal alkaloids .

main_definition: ( countable ) Any of various poisonous plants , of the genus Aconitum , with blue or white flowers in the shape of a hood.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The dried leaves or flowers of these plants formerly used as a source of medicinal alkaloids .
